overview: Mistress Zoe Bloom puts pressure on her lover to leave his wife so they can be together. Intern Ellie Eilish has an affair with a corporate executive... please don't let HR find out! While at a party, Liv Wild and Michael sneak away to make indecent love. In an illicit affair, a businessman and his client, Aidra Fox, sneak away for the weekend fulfilling all her sexual needs.
title: Erotic Affairs 3
